==Ley Line Disorder==
* When a character's Normal Attack hits an opponent, they gain 1 {{Color|help|Nucleus}} stack. This increases all party members' Normal Attack DMG by 5% for 6s. This effect can be triggered ocne every 1.5s. Max 8 stacks.
